H1.text: who was vp for nixon. George H.W. Bush

H2.text: who was vp for nixon. Gerald Ford

H3.text: who was vp for nixon. Spiro Agnew

A4.text: Agnew was sworn in along with Nixon on January 20, 1969

A5.text: In the presidential election of 1972, Nixon and Agnew were re-elected for a second term
